links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 100, L=sum(k=0, n-1, k!); write("b061640.txt", n " ", L*n!) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 25 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 13 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 19 2001
